TopicTitle: Will the next update break saves?

Articles.Content: I would like to know if possible because I heard it would be released like 2 weeks after the ARM update.
There is no information on the next update yet.

FUD.

Read the announcements and dev notes every day, then you'll know as much as we do. At the moment that's "Squad haven't made any announcements about the next update yet", anything else you hear is just rumour and speculation is pointless.

It's much too early to be asking this yet, as the developers themselves would not know at this point in the version cycle. Watch the announcements section and ask again when .24 is getting close to ready.
